alert.note: Alert for Graham; Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 9:02PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Norton and northern Graham Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 902 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lenora, or 16 miles northwest of Hill City, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Norton and northern Graham Counties, including the following locations... Densmore and New Almelo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
